description: go.talks/present: Tweak H1 CSS to avoid overlap between title and subtitle.

messages.text:
I was just now starting to create a buch of slides, and a "p" in my
title was colliding with an "A" in my subtitle. This tweak fixes it.

Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=552e6c5d1ca3&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present: Tweak H1 CSS to avoid overlap between title and subtitle.

R=adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7098070
